item.title: Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

No, I am telling you that the quest is just a bunch of actions, and understanding the Java environment you will be able to create the events. If you don’t understand I suggest you get googling “Java for noobs”.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

You can’t just “add” quests. It requires events, in the Java environment we need to use events to trigger during the program. Quests are made up of actions, Say if I clicked on an NPC and it would show a new interface to notify me that it’s complete. If you want to add a quest I would recommend getting to know the Java language. If you are new to programming you might wanna try VB or something to understand the concepts of the event driven environment.

Read full topic
